duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in relevant engineering projects and programs for R&D purposes.
Contribute to innovative solutions for improving eye health and care.
Collaborate with R&D team members to gain practical industry experience and develop valuable skills.
Engage in meaningful projects aimed at advancing eye health technologies.
Undergo personal and professional development through coaching and mentoring opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Enrollment in an accredited university for at least one semester prior to internship or co-op, pursuing a relevant engineering major.
